LangTag - app.hongs.tag中的类
语言信息读取标签 使用方法: <hs:lang load="language.name"/> <hs:lang key="language.key" [esc="yes|no|EscapeSymbol"] [_0="replacement0" _1="replacement1"]/> <hs:lang key="language.key" [esc="yes|no|EscapeSymbol"] [xx="replacementX" yy="replacementY"]/> <hs:lang key="language.key" [esc="yes|no|EscapeSymbol"] [rep=String[]|List<String>|Map<String, String>]/>
